General.Name: Etablissements Maurel et Prom SA
General.Description: Etablissements Maurel & Prom S.A., an oil and gas exploration company, engages in the exploration and production of hydrocarbons. It operates through three segments: Exploration, Production, and Drilling. The company was founded in 1831 and is headquartered in Paris, France. Etablissements Maurel & Prom S.A. is a subsidiary of PT Pertamina Internasional Eksplorasi dan Produksi.
